references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the power of diffusion models for image generation, inspiring subsequent work like CrossFlow.
This paper introduced flow matching, the core method that CrossFlow improves and adapts for cross-modality.
This is highly influential in text-to-image generation, the primary application shown for CrossFlow.
